import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../CSS/LoginSignup.css'; const SignUp = () => { const [upperHeading, setUpperHeading] = useState('Login Form'); const setButtonForSignUp = () => { setUpperHeading('Signup Form') } const setButtonForLogin = () => { setUpperHeading('Login Form') } return (

{upperHeading}

{upperHeading === 'Login Form' ? (
Not a member? Signup now
) : (
) }
); }; export default SignUp;
